summary: Simple animation replacement for incomplete dual wield blocking.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]Important![/b]Â [/color]- 5poiler offers a considerably better set of animations, in addition to other alternative blocking animations for 1h/2h, and I would recommend downloading them instead of this.

[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64510/]Blocking Animation Pack[/url] by 5poiler[/size]

========================
Dual Wield Block Animations
========================

Made specifically for Dual Wield Parrying mod. Video isn't really needed as the animations are already in game.

- Replaces default blocking animations for dual wielding, which are incomplete, with those of the torch animations.
- Requires Dual Wield Parrying! ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9247 )

Zipped and uploaded for the sake of others. None of the content is created by me.
author: Daljo
